name: Baby Bones' Last Skate
description:
This is Baby Bones' last skate. He's a baby and he's bones. He loves to skate but he's a skeleton and the afterlife is coming for him. Join Baby Bones on his last skate, avoid obstacles, collect stuff, do skate tricks and grinds!

Controls:

Spacebar to Ollie. Spacebar while in the air to Skele-flip.

Works with mobile touch inputs. Tap to Ollie, tap while in the air to skele-flip. Mobile sounds may be glitchy and crackly. Working on a fix.

Obstacles

 - Sticks & Stones: Break your bones

 - Tombstones: Also break your bones and send you to the afterlife.

 - Rail Grind: Jump on these for sick grinding action.

Collectables

 - Top Hat

 - Pink Rose

 - Boots

Global Leaderboard Screenshots
